GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.30 to before v4.9.294
GSD.description:
igbvf: fix double free in `igbvf_probe`

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.294 by commit 79d9b092035dcdbe636b70433149df9cc6db1e49, it was introduced in version v2.6.30 by commit d4e0fe01a38a073568aee541a0247fe734095979. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.details:
igbvf: fix double free in `igbvf_probe`

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.294 by commit 79d9b092035dcdbe636b70433149df9cc6db1e49, it was introduced in version v2.6.30 by commit d4e0fe01a38a073568aee541a0247fe734095979. For more details please see the references link.
